description: Integrate natural language task management with Todoist. Manage tasks, projects, and labels effortlessly using everyday language.

todoistApiToken.description: The API token for accessing Todoist API.

capabilities.name: todoist_create_task
capabilities.description: Create one or more tasks in Todoist with full parameter support

capabilities.name: todoist_get_tasks
capabilities.description: Get a list of tasks from Todoist with various filters - handles both single and batch retrieval

capabilities.name: todoist_update_task
capabilities.description: Update one or more tasks in Todoist with full parameter support

capabilities.name: todoist_delete_task
capabilities.description: Delete one or more tasks from Todoist

capabilities.name: todoist_complete_task
capabilities.description: Mark one or more tasks as complete in Todoist

capabilities.name: todoist_get_projects
capabilities.description: Get projects with optional filtering and hierarchy information

capabilities.name: todoist_create_project
capabilities.description: Create one or more projects with support for nested hierarchies

capabilities.name: todoist_update_project
capabilities.description: Update one or more projects in Todoist

capabilities.name: todoist_get_project_sections
capabilities.description: Get sections from one or more projects in Todoist

capabilities.name: todoist_create_project_section
capabilities.description: Create one or more sections in Todoist projects

capabilities.name: todoist_get_personal_labels
capabilities.description: Get all personal labels from Todoist

capabilities.name: todoist_create_personal_label
capabilities.description: Create one or more personal labels in Todoist

capabilities.name: todoist_get_personal_label
capabilities.description: Get a personal label by ID

capabilities.name: todoist_update_personal_label
capabilities.description: Update one or more existing personal labels in Todoist

capabilities.name: todoist_delete_personal_label
capabilities.description: Delete a personal label from Todoist

capabilities.name: todoist_get_shared_labels
capabilities.description: Get all shared labels from Todoist

capabilities.name: todoist_rename_shared_labels
capabilities.description: Rename one or more shared labels in Todoist

capabilities.name: todoist_remove_shared_labels
capabilities.description: Remove one or more shared labels from Todoist tasks

capabilities.name: todoist_update_task_labels
capabilities.description: Update the labels of one or more tasks in Todoist
